Goldshire Footman.name: Goldshire Footman
Goldshire Footman.flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

Frostwolf Grunt.name: Frostwolf Grunt
Frostwolf Grunt.flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

Silverback Patriarch.name: Silverback Patriarch
Silverback Patriarch.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

Senjin Shieldmasta.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Senjin Shieldmasta.flavor: Sen'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Booty Bay Bodyguard.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
Booty Bay Bodyguard.flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

Lord of the Arena.name: Lord of the Arena
Lord of the Arena.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

Shieldbearer.name: Shieldbearer
Shieldbearer.flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

Sunfury Protector.name: Sunfury Protector
Sunfury Protector.flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

Tauren Warrior.name: Tauren Warrior
Tauren Warrior.flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

Defender of Argus.name: Defender of Argus
Defender of Argus.flavor: You wouldnâ€™t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

Dread Corsair.name: Dread Corsair
Dread Corsair.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

Mogushan Warden.name: Mogu'shan Warden
Mogushan Warden.flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

Abomination.name: Abomination
Abomination.flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

Fen Creeper.name: Fen Creeper
Fen Creeper.flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

Hogger.name: Hogger
Hogger.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with_Taunt.
Hogger.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

Sunwalker.name: Sunwalker
Sunwalker.flavor: She doesnâ€™t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Donâ€™t worry!

The Black Knight.name: The Black Knight
The Black Knight.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

Unstable Ghoul.name: Unstable Ghoul
Unstable Ghoul.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.
Unstable Ghoul.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Unstable Ghoul.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Sludge Belcher.name: Sludge Belcher
Sludge Belcher.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.
Sludge Belcher.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Sludge Belcher.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Target Dummy.name: Target Dummy
Target Dummy.flavor: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

Annoy-o-Tron.name: Annoy-o-Tron
Annoy-o-Tron.flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

Gnomeregan Infantry.name: Gnomeregan Infantry
Gnomeregan Infantry.flavor: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

Lil Exorcist.name: Lil' Exorcist
Lil Exorcist.flavor: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

Arcane Nullifier X-21.name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
Arcane Nullifier X-21.text: Taunt\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Arcane Nullifier X-21.flavor: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

Enhance-o Mechano.name: Enhance-o Mechano
Enhance-o Mechano.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions Windfury, Taunt, or Divine Shield\n(at random).

Tournament Attendee.name: Tournament Attendee
Tournament Attendee.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

Evil Heckler.name: Evil Heckler
Evil Heckler.flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

Twilight Guardian.name: Twilight Guardian
Twilight Guardian.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
Twilight Guardian.flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

Master Jouster.name: Master Jouster
Master Jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
Master Jouster.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

Chillmaw.name: Chillmaw
Chillmaw.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
Chillmaw.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

Fossilized Devilsaur.name: Fossilized Devilsaur
Fossilized Devilsaur.text: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain Taunt.
Fossilized Devilsaur.flavor: This was the only job he could get after the dinosaur theme park debacle.
Fossilized Devilsaur.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Fossilized Devilsaur.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Bilefin Tidehunter.name: Bilefin Tidehunter
Bilefin Tidehunter.flavor: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

Twilight Geomancer.name: Twilight Geomancer
Twilight Geomancer.flavor: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

Squirming Tentacle.name: Squirming Tentacle
Squirming Tentacle.flavor: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

Cyclopian Horror.name: Cyclopian Horror
Cyclopian Horror.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each enemy minion.
Cyclopian Horror.flavor: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?

Faceless Shambler.name: Faceless Shambler
Faceless Shambler.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.
Faceless Shambler.flavor: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Ysera shaped."

Infested Tauren.name: Infested Tauren
Infested Tauren.flavor: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

Psych-o-Tron.name: Psych-o-Tron
Psych-o-Tron.flavor: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

Bog Creeper.name: Bog Creeper
Bog Creeper.flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.flavor: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

Twin Emperor Veklor.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
Twin Emperor Veklor.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
Twin Emperor Veklor.flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

Soggoth the Slitherer.name: Soggoth the Slitherer
Soggoth the Slitherer.text: Taunt\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Soggoth the Slitherer.flavor: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

Pompous Thespian.name: Pompous Thespian
Pompous Thespian.flavor: Alas poor Annoy-o-Tron! A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy!
Pompous Thespian.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Pompous Thespian.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Arcanosmith.name: Arcanosmith
Arcanosmith.flavor: Heâ€™s really just a Blacksmith, but he thought the fancy title would bring in more business.
Arcanosmith.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcanosmith.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Avian Watcher.name: Avian Watcher
Avian Watcher.flavor: He mostly watches light romantic comedies.
Avian Watcher.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Avian Watcher.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

The Curator.name: The Curator
The Curator.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
The Curator.flavor: The Curator guards Azerothâ€™s deadliest creatures, but itâ€™s secretly terrified of squirrels.
The Curator.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
The Curator.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Dirty Rat.name: Dirty Rat
Dirty Rat.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
Dirty Rat.flavor: It's not his faultâ€¦  Someone keeps stealing his soap!

Hired Gun.name: Hired Gun
Hired Gun.flavor: He loves his job and would do it for free!  (But don't tell his boss!)

Second-Rate Bruiser.name: Second-Rate Bruiser
Second-Rate Bruiser.text: [x]Taunt Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
Second-Rate Bruiser.flavor: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

Spiked Hogrider.name: Spiked Hogrider
Spiked Hogrider.text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain_Charge.
Spiked Hogrider.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

Ancient of Blossoms.name: Ancient of Blossoms
Ancient of Blossoms.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

Wrathion.name: Wrathion
Wrathion.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
Wrathion.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

Stubborn Gastropod.name: Stubborn Gastropod
Stubborn Gastropod.flavor: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

Stonehill Defender.name: Stonehill Defender
Stonehill Defender.flavor: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

Tar Creeper.name: Tar Creeper
Tar Creeper.flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

Stegodon.name: Stegodon
Stegodon.flavor: Level 40 Tortollan Paladins quest to tame a Stegodon.  There are no level 41 Tortollan Paladins.

Tolvir Stoneshaper.name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
Tolvir Stoneshaper.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an\nElemental last turn, gain\n_Taunt and Divine_Shield.
Tolvir Stoneshaper.flavor: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

Nesting Roc.name: Nesting Roc
Nesting Roc.text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
Nesting Roc.flavor: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

Primordial Drake.name: Primordial Drake
Primordial Drake.flavor: Before he became a rap artist.

Giant Mastodon.name: Giant Mastodon
Giant Mastodon.flavor: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

Ozruk.name: Ozruk
Ozruk.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
Ozruk.flavor: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

The Lich King.name: The Lich King
The Lich King.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Death Knight card to your hand.
The Lich King.flavor: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

Corpsetaker.name: Corpsetaker
Corpsetaker.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
Corpsetaker.flavor: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type.  She'd love for you to join it.

Prince Valanar.name: Prince Valanar
Prince Valanar.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
Prince Valanar.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

Saronite Chain Gang.name: Saronite Chain Gang
Saronite Chain Gang.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.

Bonemare.name: Bonemare
Bonemare.flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.
